/* Lib */ import cx from 'classnames' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container, Accordion, Card, Button, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' const Index = (): any => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const [result, setResult] = useState(null) const onSubmit = (data: any) => fetchSearch(data.query) const fetchSearch = async (q: string) => { const body: object = { query: q } await fetch('/api/search', body) .then((res) => { res.json() }) .then((result) => { setResult(result) }) } return ( <>
{result && console.log(result)} {/* register your input into the hook by invoking the "register" function */}
Link Score Content Location PageRank
Mark Otto @mdo
Jacob Thornton @fat
Larry the Bird @twitter
) } export default Index
